document_data.name: Olyrnn
document_data.mainbody: '''Olyrnn''' was one of the noble [[elven]] houses of [[Anauria]] in [[north Faerûn]], one of the survivor states of ancient [[Netheril]].
document_data.Activities: [[Wizard]]s of House Olyrnn that lived in the city of [[Anauril]] were significantly involved in the crafting of the its famous [[steel]] weaponry. They would imbue powerful [[item enchantment|enchantments]] on the blades that were formed by smiths that gave the "City of Swords" its moniker.
document_data.Members: Along with [[House Nyntynel]], Olyrnn was one of two families that composed Anauria's [[elven]] nobility.
document_data.History: During the [[Era of Upheaval]], some scarce remnants of the family's heraldry could still be found among the ruins of Anauria, buried beneath the sands of the great desert of [[Anauroch]].
